scripts.say: That they are. I've been informed that your rather outdated rigging is ill-suited for dealing with aircraft.
To take advantage of that, I have requested airstrikes from the mass-produced carriers positioned further behind me. Soon enough, victory shall be mine...!
You used yourself as a distraction to keep the carriers safe while they launch their airstrikes to corner me... A very smart strategy.
Unfortunately, you made a fatal mistake! You assumed my tactics are as outdated as my rigging!
